speaker.name: Peter Sobot
speaker.biography: Peter is a Staff Machine Learning Engineer at Spotify in New York, where he helps lead their Audio Intelligence Lab - an ML research lab dedicated to pushing the state of the art in audio-based machine learning. He hails from Canada (and so spells colour the _correct_ way) and when not hacking on audio software, he plays drums and bass in a handful of bands.
